entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Javascript RegEx could not be used in C# cause of not supported "--" in #79982
  • [wasm][nodejs] implement synchronous DLL loading #79981
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json fails to serialize and throws internal System.NullReferenceException #79978
  • Assert "Expression: result >= val" #79977
  • System.IO.IOException: Unable to write data to the transport connection: Broken pipe. #79976
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-alpha.1.22619.1] When IServiceProvider parameter is null in ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() method, "Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'provider')" exception will be thrown #79972
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/muldimjagary/muldimjagary/muldimjagary.sh #79967
  • Fatal error related to static abstract interface methods invoked on structs. #79968

Closed

  • Calling a managed function within GC context results in "attempted to call a UnmanagedCallersOnly method from managed code" #79971
  • SslStream_AllowRenegotiation_False_Throws fails in macOS 13 #77414
    8.0.0
  • MediaTypeHeaderValue.Parse throws FormatException with null string #77160
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 7 Regressions on 12/11/2022 2:11:02 PM #79606
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete ProcessXmlBase #79980
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix WebClient url encoding regression #79975
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in WebSocketValidate #79974
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Use function pointers instead of marshalled delegates in EventSource #79970
    area-Tracing-coreclr

Merged

  • [wasm] Convert exception messages to resource #79754
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • enable SslStream_AllowRenegotiation_False_Throws again #79914
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Remove null annotation from *HeaderValue.Parse methods #79950
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix condition in backport.yml to also trigger on schedule #79951

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix ALC lookup from the DAC #78420
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • [wasm] optional legacy JS interop #79622
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Asserts for externaly configured assets, more pendingDownload #79886
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Allow inlining for ldsfld + value-type #78736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve Http2Connection buffer management #79484
    area-System.Net.Http, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in CompareInfo.Icu.cs #79787
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Use ArrayBuffer for write buffer management in HttpConnection #79525
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 #79281
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Use ArrayBuffer for read buffer management in HttpConnection #79524
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Update suppressions now that netframework facade has forwards #79465
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action
  • Rename RdXmlFile to _DirectivesFile #79926
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Reuse handles inside a loop in reflection_create_dynamic_metho… #79716
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • Disposed change token registration should not raise consumer #79966
    area-Extensions-Primitives, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: how to do cross testing without CLRTest.NativeAot.targets #2142

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Make adding new Jit-EE APIs a little easier #2141
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge nativeaotruntime subset change #2136
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • my application could not run backgroud on ubuntu. #29665
  • .NET sdk error: The build failed. Please fix the build errors and run again. #29663

PullRequests

Merged

  • add class templates #29655
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • Upgrade helix queues #29660
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Adjust conditional params tests #29645
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Templates
  • Unskip `Publish_HostedApp_WithoutTrimming_Works` #29640
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2073958 #29624
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29629
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add subtle color highlight to const fields by default #66129
  • Using byref fields, it's possible to mutate a ref readonly without any unsafe code #66128

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fix for `return new …` statement differs between `Task` and `ValueTask` methods #66125
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor Wasam, JsInterop] JsRuntime.InvokeAsync finishes too soon, returning null #45770
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #45769
  • Unable to UnProtect payloads protected with a key which is still active #45763
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.SqlServer AddDistributedSqlServerCache add IServiceProvider support #45762

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plaintext #45760
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #45761
  • Missing JWT token with Safari (macOS and iOS) #45501
  • "Standalone" Blazor custom elements #45588
  • Make QuickGrid more inheritance friendly #45182
  • More flexibility in Blazor's navigation system regarding browser history to support multi-page browsing #44699
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `516940f` to `71140c3` #45764
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2074168 #45630
    area-mvc
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET MAUI Blazor Not Showing Blazor Views on iOS Simulator #12304
  • [iOS] Debug / Deploy is broken when specifying custom build configuration #12299
  • XAML live preview is not working for net7.0 project #12297

Closed

  • Images are not rendering in both iOS and Android #12184
  • QueryProperty is not set when navigating back to page. #12190
  • DeviceDisplay.Current.MainDisplayInfo not working #12214

PullRequests

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • how to change batch delete to update when entity is softdelete #29934

Closed

  • Consider not emitting DetachedLazyLoadingWarning when entity is new rather than detached #19338
    7.0.0
  • EF 7 Navigation propeties fixup #29568
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT/trimming compatibility for Microsoft.Data.Sqlite #29725

PullRequests

Created

  • Proof of concept: ad-hoc entity types #29931

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Include table name for overrides in snapshot. #29820
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
